meanings.definition: An arrangement of five objects with one at each corner of a square and one in the center.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the flowers were planted in a quincunx pattern.
meanings.sent2: The trees in the orchard were positioned in a quincunx for optimal sunlight exposure.
meanings.sent3: The quincunx of cupcakes on the table made it look like a delicious flower.
meanings.sent4: Her friends stood in a quincunx around her, offering support from all sides.
meanings.sent5: The quincunx of candles on the birthday cake created a beautiful centerpiece.

meanings.definition: A pattern resembling the arrangement of five objects in a quincunx.
meanings.sent1: The stars in the sky formed a quincunx that sparkled brightly.
meanings.sent2: The tiles on the floor were laid out in a quincunx design.
meanings.sent3: The quincunx of birds flying overhead looked like a perfect arrow.
meanings.sent4: The arrangement of desks in the classroom created a quincunx shape.
meanings.sent5: The quincunx of clouds in the sky painted a picturesque scene.

meanings.definition: A coin worth five twelfths of an as.
meanings.sent1: He exchanged his quincunx for smaller coins to make exact change.
meanings.sent2: The merchant handed her a quincunx in exchange for the goods.
meanings.sent3: Finding a quincunx in his pocket, he realized he had enough for a treat.
meanings.sent4: The rare quincunx was a valuable addition to his coin collection.
meanings.sent5: She saved every quincunx she received, believing they brought good luck.
